Package com.topcoder.ecommerce.creditcard.validation.algorithms

Interface Summary
ValidationAlgorithm Purpose: Defines the contract a ValidationAlgorithm must implement for this component to use it.
 

Class Summary
AbstractValidationAlgorithm Purpose: an abstract implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that provides operator type of functionality (and, or, not).
ValidationFormatAllDigits Purpose: an implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that validates that passed credit card is all digits ('0'-'9')
ValidationFormatLength Purpose: an implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that validates that passed credit card is a specific length
ValidationLUHN Purpose: an implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that applys the LUHN algorithm ot the test string
ValidationPrefix Purpose: an subclass of ValidationRange that specifically checks for a prefix.  This is a utility/helper class to more easily define prefixes.
ValidationRange Purpose: an implementation of a ValidationAlgorithm that validates that the digits at a specific position are within a specified range.
